summary: JACKSON NEW CAR OUTLET, 3500 FRANCIS ST. JACKSON.MI 49203, 517-783-2016.  CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO DEALER FOR A RECALL. 02 V 257 000, FOR FRONT BRAKE HOSE TO BE REPLACED.
